nm:output.nm:control_stream:
$PROBLEM PK model $INPUT ID TIME DV DROP DROP AMT DROP DROP DROP AGE WT $DATA sim_data.csv IGNORE=@ $SUBROUTINE ADVAN1 TRANS2 $PK
TVCL = THETA(1) + ETA(1) TVV = THETA(2) + ETA(2) TM50 = THETA(3) HL = 0.75
LCL = TVCL+LOG(WT/70)*HL+LOG((AGE)/(AGE + TM50)) LV = TVV +LOG((WT/70)) CL = EXP(LCL) V = EXP(LV) SC = V
$ERROR IPRED = F Y= IPRED*(1+EPS(1)) + EPS(2)
$THETA (0,1,100) ; TVCL (0,3,100) ; TVV (40,100,1000) ; TM50 $OMEGA 0.05 0.05 $SIGMA 0.015 0.0001 FIX $SIMULATION (4179262) ONLYSIM NSUBPROBLEM=1 $TABLE ID TIME DV AMT AGE WT FILE=mc_sim_1.tab NOAPPEND NOPRINT NOHEADER ;$EST METHOD=1 INTER MAXEVAL=9999 SIG=3 PRINT=5 NOABORT POSTHOC
